list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: reddening, inflammation, and, in severe cases, blistering and peeling of the skin caused by overexposure to the ultraviolet rays of the sun.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: my hands and face were raw with sunburn
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: bàn tay và khuôn mặt của tôi đã sống bị cháy nắng

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: cause to be affected with sunburn.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: we got sunburned but didn't realize it because of the breeze
